D.name: Deselect all frames except the current frame

DOWN_ARROW.name: Move selected point in Curves panel

LEFT_ARROW.name: Move selected point in Curves panel

R.name: Open selected images in Camera Raw dialog box from Bridge

RIGHT_ARROW.name: Move selected point in Curves panel

UP_ARROW.name: Move selected point in Curves panel

TAB.name: Cycle through controls on right from bottom
Cycle through controls on right from top
Cycle through controls on right from bottom
Cycle through controls on right from top

E.name: Toggle between Refine Radius and Erase Refinements tools

J.name: Toggle radius preview on and off

P.name: Toggle between original selection and refined version

R.name: Open the Refine Edge dialog box

X.name: Toggle between original image and selection preview

BACKSPACE.name: Delete last node while creating plane

T.name: Create a floating selection from the current selection

END.name: Move view to lower right corner

ENTER.name: Panel: Apply and keep text box active

W.name: Close File and Go to Bridge

MINUS.name: Select the previous point on the curve

NUMPAD_MINUS.name: Select the previous point on the curve

NUMPAD_PLUS.name: Select next point on the curve

PLUS.name: Select next point on the curve

ALT.name: Switch from Pen tool or Freeform Pen tool to Convert Point tool when pointer is over anchor or direction point

CONTROL.name: Switch from Path Selection, Pen, Add Anchor Point, Delete Anchor Point, or Convert Point tools, to Direct Selection tool

COMMA.name: Decrease type size of selected text

J.name: Justify paragraph, left aligns last line

NUMPAD_PERIOD.name: Increase type size of selected text

PERIOD.name: Increase type size of selected text

BACKSPACE.name: Fill with foreground or background color
Fill with foreground or background color

EIGHT.name: Set Opacity, Tolerance, Strength, or Exposure

FIVE.name: Set Opacity, Tolerance, Strength, or Exposure

FOUR.name: Set Opacity, Tolerance, Strength, or Exposure

NINE.name: Set Opacity, Tolerance, Strength, or Exposure

SEVEN.name: Set Opacity, Tolerance, Strength, or Exposure

THREE.name: Set Opacity, Tolerance, Strength, or Exposure

TWO.name: Set Opacity, Tolerance, Strength, or Exposure

ZERO.name: Set Opacity, Tolerance, Strength, or Exposure

ENTER.name: Apply/cancel an operation of the Magnetic Lasso

ESCAPE.name: Apply/cancel an operation of the Magnetic Lasso

NUMPAD_PERIOD.name: Apply/cancel an operation of the Magnetic Lasso

PERIOD.name: Apply/cancel an operation of the Magnetic Lasso

CONTROL.name: Toggle between Slice tool and Slice Selection tool

CAPSLOCK.name: Display precise cross hair for brushes
Display precise cross hair for brushes

BACKSLASH.name: Toggle rubylith mode for layer mask on/off

E.name: Merge a copy of all visible layers into target layer

LEFT_BRACKET.name: Add to layer selection in Layers panel

NUMPAD_SLASH.name: Toggle lock transparency for target layer, or last applied lock

RIGHT_BRACKET.name: Add to layer selection in Layers panel

SLASH.name: Toggle lock transparency for target layer, or last applied lock

DOWN_ARROW.name: Move to the Out point of the current layer

END.name: Move to the end of the timeline
Move to the end of the work area

ESCAPE.name: Return a rotated document to its original orientation

HOME.name: Move to the beginning of the timeline
Move to the beginning of the work area

SPACE.name: Start playing the timeline or Animation panel

UP_ARROW.name: Move to In point of the current layer
